iCoo,iCab,jCoo,iRib,iTALS,jTALS
tofcLENG = tpcg_Length-2*tpcg_WheelTHK-2*TPCR_RdoVthk ! gas plus endcaps tpgvLeng = (tofcLeng-tpcg_MembTHK)/2 ! active gas tpgvLeng = (TPCG_LengthV-tpcg_MembTHK)/2 ! active gas
tocsIR = TPCG_SenGasOR tocsOR = tocsIR + TPCG_tocsDR tokaIR = tocsOR; tokaOR = tokaIR + TPCG_tokaDR tonxIR = tokaOR; tonxOR = tonxIR + TPCG_tonxDR toadIR = tonxOR; toadOR = toadIR + TPCG_toadDR
toigIR = toadOR; toigOR = toigIR + TPCG_toigDR toalIR = toigOR; toalOR = toalIR + TPCG_toalDR/2. tohaIR = toalOR; tohaOR = tohaIR + TPCG_tohaDR toalIR2= tohaOR; toalOR2= toalIR2+ TPCG_toalDR/2.
tofcIR = tocsIR; tofcOR = toalOR2 tofsIR = tocsIR; tofsOR = toadOR
tifcIR = TPCG_RminIFC tialIR = tifcIR; tialOR = tialIR + TPCG_tialDR/2. tikaIR = tialOR; tikaOR = tikaIR + TPCG_tikaDR tinxIR = tikaOR; tinxOR = tinxIR + TPCG_tinxDR tiadIR = tinxOR; tiadOR = tiadIR + TPCG_tiadDR tifcOR = tiadOR + TPCG_tialDR/2.
tpgvIR = tifcOR; !// TPC gas inner radius del = TPCG_Rmax-tofcOR
TPCG_version
%ivolume,%volume
tpgvz = (tpcg_MembTHK + tpgvLeng)/2 zWheel1 = TPCG_LengthW/2 - TPCG_WheelTHK; zTOFCend = TPCG_LengthW/2 - TPCG_WheelTHK1; zTIFCend = TPCG_LengthW/2 + 0.97; zTIFCFlangeBegin = zTIFCend - 1*INCH;
dX2 = 1.470 dX = 0
mycount = 0;
z2 = zWheel1 z1 = z2 - TECW_Thick z = (z1 + TPCG_MembTHK/2)/2 dz = (z1 - TPCG_MembTHK/2)/2
x1 = -TECW_Height/2 x2 = TECW_Height/2 y1 = TECW_inwidth/2 y2 = TECW_ouwidth/2 x0 = (y1*x2-y2*x1)/(x2-x1)
dYdX = (y2 - y1)/(x2 - x1) alpha = 180./Pi*ATAN(dYdX)
r1 = y1/dYdX r2 = y2/dYdX
dRSectorShift = TECW_rMin - r1
xHoles(0) = r2 - 1.988*INCH
xHoles(i) = xHoles(i-1) - 1.575*INCH
xHoles(i) = r2 - (1.988 + 1.575*i)*INCH
x1 = TPCG_WheelR0*cos15 x2 = TPCG_WheelR2 dz = TPCG_WheelRibHeight/2 z = zWheel1 + dz dx = (x2 - x1)/2 dy = TPCG_WheelTotalRibWidth/4 x = (x1 + x2)/2 y = (x *tan15 - dy)*(2*inOut-1)
myDx=dy; myDy=dx; myDz=dz; myAlph=-(1-2*inOut)*15
dz = TPCG_WheelTHK/2 z = zWheel1 + dz dy = TPCG_WheelRibWidth/4 x = (x1 + x2)/2 y = (x *tan15 - dy)*(2*inOut-1)
myDx=dy; myDy=dx; myDz=dz; myAlph=-(1-2*inOut)*15
r = TPCG_WheelR2 - 1.5/8.5*(TPCG_WheelR2 - TPCG_WheelR1)
r = TPCG_WheelR2 - 6.5/8.5*(TPCG_WheelR2 - TPCG_WheelR1)
r = TPCG_WheelR1 - 2.0/8.5*(TPCG_WheelR1 - TPCG_WheelR0)
r = TPCG_WheelR1 - 7.0/8.5*(TPCG_WheelR1 - TPCG_WheelR0)
x = r y = r *tand(alpha)
mycount+=1;
qwe(1) = -qwe(1) qwe(2) = -qwe(2)
RCoolingTube = TPCG_WheelR2 - TPCG_heigTube - 2*TPCG_dxRDO
dz = TPCG_heigTube*cm/2 dy = TPCG_widTube *cm/2 z = RCoolingTube dx1 = (z-dz)*tan15 - 2*TPCG_RDOCoolingdY dx2 = (z+dz)*tan15 - 2*TPCG_RDOCoolingdY
iShape = kTrd1;
RCoolingTube -= dRDOCooling(iCoo)
dz = 4.5 dy = 4.5/2 z = TPCG_zRDO + TPCG_dzRDO + dz x1 = TPCG_WheelR0 x2 = TPCG_WheelR2 dx = (x2 - x1)/2 x = (x1 + x2)/2
y = - (x *tan15 - dy) * (1 - 2*iCab)
dy = (r2 - r1)/2 y = (r2 + r1)/2 dx = TECW_widthRib/2 dz = (TECW_Thick - TPCG_PadPlaneThickness - TECW_ThickAl)/2 z = z2 - dz dxW = TPCG_WireMountWidth/cos15/2 dzW = TPCG_WireMountHeight/2 xW = 0
iShape = kPara;
x = ((y1 + y2)/2 - dx)*(1-2*iRib)
xW = ((y1 + y2)/2 - dxW)*(1-2*iRib)
zW = z1 - dzW/2
r = r2 - RIBS_x(irib+1) * INCH y = RIBS_y(irib+1) * INCH dr = RIBS_dx(irib+1) * INCH dy = RIBS_dy(irib+1) * INCH
dx2 = r *dYdX - TECW_widthRib - 2*dxW; ! TECW_widthLip dx1 = (r - dr)*dYdX - TECW_widthRib - 2*dxW; ! TECW_widthLip xc = r - TECW_zStepRib/2
iShape = kTrd1;
iShape = kBbox;
dx = TPCG_widTube*cm/2 dz = depthIOF(inOut+1)/2 dy = heightIOF(inOut+1)/2
y1 = - dy y2 = dy x1 = width1IOF(inOut+1)/2 - dx x2 = width2IOF(inOut+1)/2 - dx x0 = (y1*x2-y2*x1)/(y2-y1)
dYdX = (x2 - x1)/(y2 - y1) beta = 180./Pi*ATAN(dYdX)
dy -= 0.7
y = xHoles(0) - dy x = (x1 + x2)/2
iShape = kPara;
x = xHoles(iCoo); !// cm
dx = TPCG_heigTube*cm/2 dz = TPCG_widTube*cm/2 dy = COOL_tubeLength( icoo+1 )*INCH / 2
dy2 = dy + 2*dYdX*dx dy1 = dy;
dy2 = dy dy1 = dy - 2*dYdX*dx
iShape = kTrd1;
myPar(11) = x-dx-TFEE_AssemblyThickness/2+dRSectorShift myPar(13) = zWheel1+dz
y = HOLZ_yholes( 9*icoo + jcoo + 1 )*INCH
myPar(1) = TECW_holeDx myPar(2) = TECW_holeDy myPar(3) = TECW_ThickAl/2
myPar(13) = zWheel1 - TECW_Thick + TPCG_PadPlaneThickness + TECW_ThickAl/2
myPar(11) = xHoles(iTALS); !// cm
myPar(12) = HOLZ_yholes( 9*itals+jtals+1) *INCH
myCos = cos15; myRmin=TPCG_WheelR2; myRmax = TPCG_WheelOR1 myG1 = myRmin*cos15
nCount = 0
ncount += 1 myg2 = myRmin
myG2 = myRMax*myCos
alpha = ACos(myCos)*raddeg;
myCos = myG2/myRmin; myG1=myG2
break
myG1=TPCG_WheelR2 - (TPCG_WheelTotalRibWidth-TPCG_WheelRibWidth)/2
myG1=TPCG_WheelR2 - (TPCG_WheelTotalRibWidth-TPCG_WheelRibWidth)/2
iShape = kPara;
x = TPCG_WheelR2 - TPCG_RDOCoolingdX y = x*tan15 - TPCG_RDOCoolingdY z = TPCG_zRDO - 2*dy
iShape = kPara;
x = TPCG_WheelR2 - TPCG_RDOCoolingdX y = x*tan15 - TPCG_RDOCoolingdY z = TPCG_zRDO - 2*dy
RCoolingTube = TPCG_WheelR2 - TPCG_heigTube - 2*TPCG_dxRDO
dz = TPCG_heigTube*cm/2 dy = TPCG_widTube*cm/2 z = RCoolingTube dx1 = (z-dz)*tan15 - 2*TPCG_RDOCoolingdY dx2 = (z+dz)*tan15 - 2*TPCG_RDOCoolingdY
iShape = kTrd1;
myPar(11) = z; myPar(13) = TPCG_zRDO - 2*dy
myPar(11) = z + dz + TPCG_dxRDO; myPar(13) = TPCG_zRDO-TPCG_dzRDO
RCoolingTube -= dRDOCooling(iCoo)
zWheel1 = TPCG_LengthW/2 - TPCG_WheelTHK zBeg = TPCG_MembTHK/2 zEnd = TPCG_zGroundGrid + TPRS_dAnode*2 zDed = TPCG_zGatingGrid - TPCG_DeadZone zPmt = TPCG_zGatingGrid dx = tprs_width/2
dz = (zDed - zBeg)/2; z = (zDed + zBeg)/2 - tpgvz
dz = (zEnd - zPmt)/2; z = (zEnd + zPmt)/2 - tpgvz
dy=tprs_npads(i_row)*tprs_pitch/2 x=tprs_Rpads(i_row)-tprs_width
dy=tprs_npads(i_row)*tprs_pitch/2 x=tprs_Rpads(i_row)
x=tprs_Rpads(i_row)+tprs_width dy=tprs_npads(i_row)*tprs_pitch/2
